markdown.content: @staff Can you make an option to hide my own post/rechost/rebug in the homepage/timeline? I just clear my backlog and now my homepage/timeline is filled with my own rechost/rebug lol

Hello! If you are following me, I suggest unfollowing me. I mostly rechost/rebug. I have been away from cohost for a while, so if I spam your homepage, I'm sorry, I try to only share the most interesting ones but it can be a lot of posts (I just clear my backlog and rechost/rebug nearly 70 posts), and just unfollow me lmao I will not know (because cohost not alerting unfollow is the best) and even if I do know I literally do not care lol.
